primary_objectives.title: Grow CCGG Revenue Through Staged MRR Milestones
primary_objectives.description: Scale CCGG as the core asset and revenue machine through clear revenue stages, driving paid community growth and upgrades.
key_results: Phase 1 (Short-Term): Reach $5K MRR with 185 monthly or 84 annual members
Phase 2 (Next Milestone): Scale to $10K MRR with 370 monthly or 167 annual members
Phase 3 (Expansion): Grow to $25K MRR with 925 monthly or 417 annual members
Phase 4 (Long-Term): Reach $50K MRR before scaling to $100K MRR

primary_objectives.title: Establish CCGG as the Lean GPT Business Category Leader
primary_objectives.description: Position CCGG as the pioneer of 'Lean GPT Entrepreneurship,' blending proven frameworks with AI assistants to deliver clarity and results in a skeptical, saturated market.
key_results: Develop and release advanced modules like AI Growth Engine, Money GPT, and Content Clone GPT
Showcase 12+ member success stories as proof points
Be recognized as the go-to paid community for Lean GPT Business

primary_objectives.title: Build Financial Freedom Through Ownership
primary_objectives.description: Grow CCGG and AI Leaders into scalable, cash flow-producing assets, aiming toward $3M annual revenue and long-term financial independence.
key_results: Scale CCGG to $50K MRR with 2,000+ members before targeting $100K MRR
Expand AI Leaders into the top-tier implementation community
Achieve personal net worth target of $20M through owned business assets

secondary_objectives.title: Expand YouTube as Primary Traffic Engine
secondary_objectives.description: Build and systematize YouTube as the #1 content and acquisition channel for CCGG growth.
key_results: Achieve clear funnel conversion from YouTube views to paid CCGG signups

secondary_objectives.title: Strengthen Community Retention and Annual Upgrades
secondary_objectives.description: Maximize CCGG retention (85%+ monthly, 95%+ annual) and drive annual upgrades through advanced tools, member success visibility, and premium AI Leaders benefits.
key_results: Launch referral and affiliate program to incentivize growth
Maintain monthly retention above 85% and annual retention above 95%
Secure 30-40% annual upgrade rate across members

notes: Revenue objectives now reflect staged milestones: $5K, $10K, $25K, $50K, leading to $100K MRR
